attributes.action: The legal age for consuming alcohol to be increased to 21
attributes.additional_details: Increasing the legal age will discourage underage drinking and promote responsibility amongst young adults.
attributes.background: Alcohol is a big problem to many families living in the UK, resulting in crime and fatality. Alcoholism is/can be the same, if not worse than drug addiction which can lead to a variety of issues domestically, and out in the community.
